full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'PHAGS PA GTZUG TOR DRI MED LHA LNGA'I RAS BRIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR BSGRUB CING MCHOD PA DANG SLOB MA RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKOD PA YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034B (CES 'PHAGS GTZUG @035A *, ,TOR DRI MED LHA LNGA'I RAS BRIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR BSGRUB CING MCHOD PA DANG SLOB MA RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I CHO GA 'KHYER BDER BKOD PA YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, PHYOGS 'DI'I SKYE BO MANG PO'I DAD RTEN DU RNAM PAR RGYAL MA'I MCHOD RTEN ZHIG GSAR DU BSKRUN PA'I NANG BUM STAN GYI THAD SROG SHING GI MDUN NGOS KYI GA-YAS ZUR DU GTZUG TOR DRI MED LHA LNGA DANG, GA-YON ZUR DU 'OD ZER DRI MED LHA DRUG GI RAS BRIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR MCHOD RDZAS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SU GSOL NAS BSGRUB CING MCHOD DE BRTAN BZHUGS BGYIS YOD PA DE DAG LA DUS SU DKYIL 'KHOR BSGRUB MCHOD YANG YANG BYED RGYUR CHOG 'KHYER BDE BA ZHIG DGOS TSUL BYUNG BA DANG, GZHAN YANG TSOGS GSOG SGRIB SBYANG DANG CHOS RGYUN SPEL BA SOGS KYI SKABS DU MA YI GE BKLAGS CHOG MA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG NA, MCHOG DMAN KUN LA PHAN CHE BAR MTHONG NAS; ^BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I BAN RGAN SNYOM LAS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI, DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG GSOL DPON BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG POS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN BDE RGYA CHEN PO RGYUN MI 'CHAD DU 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG,, ,, SHU BHAm MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,
